long_description: Place this lightweight nylon tarp under your REI Hobitat 6 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear. Nylon footprint is slightly smaller than tent floor to prevent pooling of water between tent and ground sheet during wet weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment. Special buy.
short_description: Place this lightweight nylon tarp under your REI Hobitat 6 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear.
